item.title: 乌干达证券交易所计划在首次公开募股前充实资本金
item.description: 乌干达证券交易所计划明年出售中期票据，以便在拟议的股票出售之前增加资本。【原文：Uganda Securities Exchange plans to sell medium-term notes next year to bolster its capital before a proposed share sale.】

item.title: 美国消费者信心因经济和就业市场前景而上升
item.description: 由于对整体经济和劳动力市场前景的担忧有所缓解，7 月份美国消费者信心指数有所上升。【原文：US consumer confidence increased in July as concerns eased about the outlook for the broader economy and the labor market.】

item.title: 贝克休斯签署 2025 年最大一笔图表购买过桥贷款协议
item.description: 贝克休斯公司（Baker Hughes Co. ）以 96 亿美元收购 Chart Industries Inc.【原文：Baker Hughes Co. has lined up the biggest blue-chip debt financing for an acquisition this year after cinching a $9.6 billion deal to buy Chart Industries Inc.】

item.title: 美国职位空缺在连续跃升后降至 744 万个
item.description: 美国 6 月份的职位空缺在前两个月逐月上升后有所下降，但总体水平在过去一年中保持在一个稳定的范围内，这表明对工人的需求总体上保持稳定。【原文：US job openings fell in June after jumping in each of the prior two months, keeping the overall level in a consistent range over the past year that indicates generally stable demand for workers.】

item.title: 美联储会议前美股再创新高
item.description: 在美联储会议召开之前，贸易协议提振了投资者的乐观情绪，美股正朝着再创新高的目标迈进。【原文：US stocks are heading for another record high with trade deals boosting investors’ optimism ahead of the Federal Reserve’s meeting.】

item.title: 人工智能基础设施公司 Whitefiber 寻求首次公开募股 1.328 亿美元
item.description: Whitefiber Inc. 是加密货币财务公司比特数字公司（Bit Digital Inc.【原文：Whitefiber Inc., an artificial intelligence infrastructure subsidiary of crypto treasury firm Bit Digital Inc., is seeking to raise as much as $132.8 million in an initial public offering.】

item.title: 一级交易商预计本季度国债拍卖规模稳定
item.description: 美国政府债券交易商一致预计，财政部将在 8 月至 10 月期间保持票息拍卖规模不变，这与财政部 4 月份的指导保持一致。【原文：US government bond dealers uniformly expect the Treasury Department to keep coupon auction sizes unchanged during the August-to-October period, in keeping with the department’s guidance in April.】

item.title: 中国部长在北京会见包括苹果公司在内的美国代表团
item.description: 一位中国高级官员在北京与包括苹果公司在内的美国公司高管代表团会面时重申了中国与美国企业 "健康 "发展的承诺。【原文：A top Chinese official reiterated the country’s commitment to “healthy” development with American businesses during a meeting in Beijing with a delegation of executives from US companies, including Apple Inc.】

item.title: 欧佩克+"石油赌局的成本暂时有所降低
item.description: 石油输出国组织+（OPEC+）开放石油水龙头的震撼举措所带来的经济影响似乎正在消退。【原文：The financial sting of OPEC+’s shock move to open the oil taps appears to be fading — for the time being.】

item.title: 由 OpenAI 支持的健康初创企业 Ambience 估值超过 10 亿美元
item.description: Ambience Healthcare Inc.是一家人工智能初创公司，致力于简化医疗专业人员的行政工作，该公司在新一轮融资中筹集了 2.43 亿美元，估值超过 10 亿美元。【原文：Ambience Healthcare Inc., an artificial intelligence startup focused on streamlining administrative work for medical professionals, has raised $243 million in a new round of funding that values the company at more than $1 billion.】

item.title: 杰克-多西（Jack Dorsey）的布洛克公司（Block）希望通过团体支付工具吸引现金应用用户
item.description: 杰克-多西（Jack Dorsey）的 Block Inc. 公司正在为其现金应用程序增加一项团体支付功能，目的是吸引网络外用户使用其点对点汇款和银行应用程序。【原文：Jack Dorsey’s Block Inc. is adding a group payments feature to its Cash App as it aims to attract out of network users to its peer-to-peer money transfer and banking app.】

item.title: 由于改革滞后，欧盟将减少对乌克兰的援助款项
item.description: 在基辅表示无法达到所有要求的改革里程碑之后，欧盟计划将对乌克兰的一揽子重要财政支持减少 15 亿欧元（17 亿美元）。【原文：The European Union plans to reduce a major package of financial support to Ukraine by €1.5 billion ($1.7 billion) after Kyiv said it had been unable to meet all required reform milestones, said a spokesperson of the bloc’s executive.】

item.title: 美国住房市场价格增速连续第四个月放缓
item.description: 5 月份，美国房价增速连续第四个月放缓。【原文：Home-price growth in the US decelerated in May for the fourth consecutive month.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织称全球 "岌岌可危 "的贸易背景正在阻碍经济增长
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）表示，尽管世界经济对唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税表现出了一定的抵御能力，但世界经济仍将持续疲软，并且仍然容易受到贸易冲击的影响。【原文：The world economy will keep weakening and remains vulnerable to trade shocks even though it is showing some resilience to Donald Trump’s tariffs, the International Monetary Fund said.】

item.title: Cantor, Tether 支持的 Twenty One 提高比特币控股目标
item.description: 由 Cantor Fitzgerald LP 的关联公司、稳定币发行商 Tether Holdings SA 和软银集团共同发起的比特币财务公司 Twenty One Capital Inc.【原文：Twenty One Capital Inc., the Bitcoin treasury company launched by an affiliate of Cantor Fitzgerald LP, stablecoin issuer Tether Holdings SA and SoftBank Group, is increasing its holdings of the cryptocurrency beyond the initial amount announced when it debuted with much fanfare earlier this year.】

item.title: 特朗普关税威胁巴西对新橙种植区的押注
item.description: 经过数十年与致命疾病的斗争，头号生产国巴西的柑橘种植者们终于在该国东北部的柑橘新边疆扩大了产量。现在，唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税措施有可能使这一新兴产业停滞不前。【原文：After decades battling a deadly disease, orange growers in top producer Brazil were finally expanding output in a new citrus frontier northeast of the country. Now President Donald Trump’s tariffs threaten to stall the nascent industry.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）称英国经济增长速度将连续两年快于欧洲同行
item.description: 据国际货币基金组织称，英国今明两年的经济增长速度将超过欧洲其他主要经济体，但在七大工业化国家集团中将继续落后于美国和加拿大。【原文：Britain will grow faster than any other major European economy this year and next but continue to lag behind the US and Canada among Group of Seven industrialized nations, according to the International Monetary Fund.】

item.title: 安哥拉首都恢复平静，高成本引发的骚乱仍在蔓延
item.description: 抗议燃料价格上涨的示威蔓延到安哥拉中部城市万博，当局称，在警察出动平息造成至少四人死亡的骚乱后，首都恢复了平静。【原文：Protests against rising fuel prices spread to Angola’s central city of Huambo, as authorities said calm returned to the capital after police were deployed to quell unrest that left at least four people dead.】

item.title: B.莱利确定了发布涵盖逾期未交的 2024 年结果报告的日期
item.description: B.Riley Financial Inc. 安排在下月中旬召开财报电话会议，这通常是例行公事，但在这种情况下，这表明这家金融服务公司距离提交逾期已久的监管报告越来越近了。【原文：B. Riley Financial Inc. scheduled an earnings call for the middle of next month, a normally routine matter, but in this case it suggests that the financial services firm is closer to filing its long-overdue regulatory reports.】

item.title: 美国协议的残酷现实引发欧盟对失去影响力的反思
item.description: 在欧盟领导人研究与美国达成的新贸易安排的后果时，他们正面临着一个痛苦的现实，那就是他们已经堕落到了何种地步。【原文：As European Union leaders work through the consequences of their new trading arrangement with the US, they are confronting the bitter reality of just how far they have fallen.】

item.title: 美国货物贸易逆差因进口大幅下降而收窄
item.description: 美国 6 月份商品贸易逆差的缩减幅度超过预期，这反映出随着关税前抢购商品风潮的消退，进口出现了普遍下降。【原文：The US merchandise-trade deficit shrank in June by more than forecast, reflecting a broad decline in imports as the pre-tariff rush to secure goods unwinds.】

item.title: Peloton 在全美推出二手自行车和跑步机转售计划
item.description: Peloton Interactive 公司正在全国范围内推出自行车和跑步机的转售市场，在过去两个月里，该公司进行了一次小规模测试，售出了大约三十多台自行车和跑步机。【原文：Peloton Interactive Inc. is launching a resale marketplace for its bikes and treadmills nationally after a small test resulted in about three dozen sales over the past two months.】

item.title: 贝恩关闭丑闻缠身的南非咨询业务
item.description: 贝恩公司（Bain & Co.）将关闭其在约翰内斯堡的咨询业务，这很可能为其在非洲最大经济体中长达数年试图恢复声誉的斗争画上句号。【原文：Bain & Co. is closing down its consultancy business in Johannesburg, likely bringing to an end a years-long battle to try and restore its reputation in Africa’s biggest economy following a 2022 ban.】

item.title: 穆迪称美国征收关税后信用状况恶化
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）称，美国宣布加征关税后，信用状况恶化，公司违约增加，不良债务交易主导市场。【原文：Credit conditions deteriorated in the wake of US tariff announcements, with company defaults increasing and distressed debt exchanges dominating the market, according to Moody’s Ratings.】

item.title: 随着银行拥抱数字资产，经纪商 FalconX 扩展到巴西
item.description: 数字资产主经纪商 FalconX 正在向拉丁美洲扩张，以满足该地区机构对加密货币日益增长的需求。【原文：Digital asset prime broker FalconX is expanding into Latin America as it seeks to address growing institutional demand for cryptocurrencies in the region.】

item.title: 人工智能的蓬勃发展正在给美国最大的电网带来压力
item.description:
自 6 月份以来，PJM Interconnection&bsp已为其网络发布了 9 次能源紧急警报。【原文：

PJM Interconnection has issued nine energy emergency alerts for its network since June.

item.title: 据说华润集团即将以 21 亿美元收购生态材料公司
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，建筑材料供应商 CRH Plc 正在就以 21 亿美元收购 Eco Material Technologies 进行深入谈判，这将是该公司在北美水泥替代品市场的一次重大扩张。【原文：Building-materials provider CRH Plc is in advanced talks to buy Eco Material Technologies for $2.1 billion in what would be a major expansion in the cement-alternatives market in North America, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 香港置地看到写字楼市场复苏，需求增加
item.description: 香港金融区最大的商业业主香港置地控股有限公司（Hongkong Land Holdings Ltd.）看到了香港低迷的写字楼市场正在复苏。【原文：Hongkong Land Holdings Ltd., the biggest commercial landlord in Hong Kong’s financial district, is seeing a recovery in the city’s ailing office market.】

item.title: 杜克将以 25 亿美元向 Spire 出售田纳西州天然气业务
item.description: 杜克能源公司同意以 25 亿美元的价格将田纳西皮德蒙特天然气业务出售给 Spire 公司。【原文：Duke Energy agreed to sell its Tennessee Piedmont Natural Gas business to Spire Inc. for $2.5 billion.】

item.title: 诺和诺德因减肥药销售不佳而下调业绩预期
item.description: 诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）在一份出人意料的最新报告中下调了财务预期，原因是其减肥药 Wegovy 的销售滞后，该公司在肥胖症市场上已被礼来公司（Eli Lilly & Co.该公司股价暴跌。【原文：Novo Nordisk A/S slashed its financial forecast in a surprise update that cited lagging sales of its weight-loss drug Wegovy, as the company loses ground to Eli Lilly & Co. in the obesity market. The shares plunged.】
